==== Notes ====
The Installation did run fine. 	Although it's an old Laptop (P3,1,16 Ghz, 256 MB-Ram) working under Hardy is accurate. Big OpenOffice presentations with many pictures are slow , but for Textwriter, Email, Internet, Programming (Geany, Fortran, C++), Latex it is fine.
